Name: The Grand Tournament
Details: The Grand Tournament is the premier competition on Solaris VII, where 128 MechWarriors compete in a seven-day single-elimination tournament to determine the Grand Champion.  In an attempt to be as fair as possible, and keep the odds as even as possible, opponents are matched by comparative weight classes and weapon load-outs with the Tournament Committees determining the best arenas for each fight.  The winner walks away with upwards of ¢500,000 purse and often attracts merchandising deals.
